CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL( NCT_Scheduled_Date__c),
(today() - (NCT_Scheduled_Date__c)),
(NCT_Scheduled_Date__c - Client_Load_Date__c - 2*( floor((NCT_Scheduled_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Client_Load_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of days is calculated starting from the date that the case is transferred to the Advisor until date of when client attended live client training
CustomField.label: Total Days between Setup and LCT
